author: Daniel Guild
text: Has anyone successfully implemented a PTO system for paid leave management with a Fire Department on a California schedule? If so, could you please email me a copy of the accrual schedule to dguild@westonwi.gov or post here on the PARC? Thanks for your help!
title: Firefighters on California Schedule & PTO
